Index A convenience class to hold common methods used by the our controllers
Mock Utilized by functional tests to perform data loading
Servers This controller handles requests for new rooms, and updates information about the servers
Users This controller is responsible for keeping track of users, updating their status in the system, assigning them rooms, passing chat requests, etc..
